summary: A hit man is hired to kill a mob boss. After the deed is done, he and his driver are wanted dead by rival gangs who joined forces.
cast: Jô Shishido|Jerry Fujio|Chitose Kobayashi|Ryôtarô Sugi|Kanjûrô Arashi|Shôki Fukae|Eimei Esumi|Jun Hongô|Akio Miyabe|Toyoko Takechi|Takamaru Sasaki|Asao Uchida|Zekô Nakamura|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Zenji Yamada|Tomoo Uchida|Hideaki Ezumi|Satoko Sato|Takeshi Yoshida|Hiroshi Chô|Shirô Yanase|Toshizô Kudô|Yasue Nishihara|Kensuke Akashi|Yoshihiko Tabata|Dokô Kihara|Yû Izumi|Wataru Takagi|Keisuke Noro|Ichirô Kojima|Gô Kuroda|Yasuo Itoga|Yûzô Harumi|Jirô Hiratsuka|Takeshi Ida|Keisuke Yukioka|Shinzô Shibata|Hidemi Tôgô|Chigusa Takayama|Tokuhei Miyahara|Hitoshi Takagi|Tetsurô Ishibiya|Hyôe Enoki
title: Koruto wa ore no pasupooto
